en.warning_you_were_kicked: You were kicked from the chat
en.ui_ban_confirmation: Are you sure you want to ban this user?
en.invisible_warning: You are currently in invisible mode. If you send a message to the chatroom, other users will still be able to see it. Click Become visible to disable invisible mode and enter the chat normally.
en.help_private_message_body: To send a private message to a user, just click on the mail icon next to their username. Type your message into the text area that will appear and hit send!
en.help_formatting_body:
To write text in italics, enclose that text in a single asterisk, like *text*.
For bold text, use double asterisks: **bold**.
If you want to write a message in third person, type /me at the beginning of your message!
en.help_attachments_body: To send an attachment, click on the paperclip icon next to the message textbox. Select your file and hit upload. A link to the file will be generated and sent as a message to the chat.
en.help_settings_body: Click on the cogs icon to display settings. There you can change the color theme of the chat, the language, and toggle notification sounds for mentions and private messages.
en.help_mentions_body: To mention a user, type their username after @ like so: @user. If they enabled sound for notifications, they will hear a beep.
